abstract.text: A transformer that takes an asynchronous input sequence of temporal features and produces an asynchronous output  sequence.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: A temporal transformer, unlike a regular transformer, can accumulate multiple inputs before producing an output.
For example, an audio transformer can accumulate audio buffers until the desired length is reached before producing
